thread.section_title: The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fabulous
thread.title_full: Fabulous - Review of The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jemimahc2017
title: Fabulous
text: Everyone was great. The room was clean , the hotel it self was pretty cool. Very artsy . The staff was great. Ladies at the front desk to the bell boy and the late night staff. He helped us get pizza at 1 in the morning. 99 cents a slice , you cant beat that. Our flight arrived early and check in is at 3 , they were nice enough to keep our luggage while we walked around the city and also the day we left. I loved it , next time i go again I will be staying there.Everything was super close, was able to walk to everything ! thanks again!!!!
